data.trans: Mách lẻo, để lộ bí mật, kể ra
data.trans_hint: Tớ sẽ kết hôn vào tuần tới, nhưng cậu đừng để lộ ra nhé, được không?
data.en_hint: I'm getting married next week, but please don't let on, will you?
data.content_game_1: I'm getting married next week, but please don't let on, will you?
data.answer_en_hint: I'm getting married next week, but please don't let on, will you?

data.trans: Thoát được, tránh khỏi sự trừng phạt
data.trans_hint: Họ đã may mắn thoát được chỉ bị nộp một khoản tiền phạt nhỏ.
data.en_hint: They were lucky to get away with only a small fine.
data.content_game_1: They were lucky to Get away with only a small fine.
data.answer_en_hint: They were lucky to Get away with only a small fine.

data.trans: Bị phát hiện nói dối, làm sai điều gì (sau khi bị tra hỏi)
data.trans_hint: Tôi muốn dấu mối quan hệ vụng trộm này với cô ấy, nhưng chỉ sau vài câu hỏi, tôi đã bị phát hiện.
data.en_hint: I wanted to keep the secret love affair from her, but after just a few questions, I was caught out.
data.content_game_1: I wanted to keep the secret love affair from her, but after just a few questions, I was caught out.
data.answer_en_hint: I wanted to keep the secret love affair from her, but after just a few questions, I was caught out.

data.trans_hint: Họ ly dị bởi vì anh ta bị phát hiện lừa dối cô ấy trong chính mái nhà của họ.
data.en_hint: They got divorced because he was found out cheating on her in their own house.
data.content_game_1: They got divorced because he was found out cheating on her in their own house.
data.answer_en_hint: They got divorced because he was found out cheating on her in their own house.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta cảm thấy tội lỗi khi lấy trộm tiền của bố, vì vậy cuối cùng anh ta đã thú nhận.
data.en_hint: He felt guilty for stealing money from his dad, so eventually he came clean.
data.content_game_1: He felt guilty for stealing money from his dad, so eventually he came clean.
data.answer_en_hint: He felt guilty for stealing money from his dad, so eventually he came clean.

data.trans_hint: Tôi kiếm cớ bận việc để tránh gặp cô ấy, nhưng chị gái tôi đã làm lộ bí mật.
data.en_hint: I made an excuse about work to avoid seeing her, but my sister gave the game away.
data.content_game_1: I made an excuse about work to avoid seeing her, but my sister gave the game away.
data.answer_en_hint: I made an excuse about work to avoid seeing her, but my sister gave the game away.

data.trans_hint: Họ cố gắng giữ bí mật rằng con trai họ được nhận nuôi từ anh ta, nhưng con trai họ đã biết.
data.en_hint: They tried to keep the fact that their son was adopted from him, but he found out.
data.content_game_1: They tried to keep the fact that their son was adopted from him, but he found out.
data.answer_en_hint: They tried to keep the fact that their son was adopted from him, but he found out.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã bịa chuyện để bao che cho lỗi lầm mà tôi làm, nhưng họ đã biết tỏng nó rồi.
data.en_hint: I made up a story to cover up the problem that I made, but they saw through it.
data.content_game_1: I made up a story to cover up the problem that I made, but they saw through it.
data.answer_en_hint: I made up a story to cover up the problem that I made, but they saw through it.

data.content: pull the wool over somebody's eyes
data.trans: Lừa ai (Vải thưa che mắt thánh)
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy rất thông minh đến nỗi không ai có thể che mắt anh ta được chuyện gì.
data.en_hint: He is very smart that no one has managed to pull the wool over his eyes.
data.content_game_1: He is very smart that no one has managed to pull the wool over his eyes.
data.answer_en_hint: He is very smart that no one has managed to pull the wool over his eyes.

data.trans_hint: Nếu có điều gì bạn không hài lòng về tôi, hãy cứ nói thẳng với tôi đây này.
data.en_hint: If there is anything that you are not happy about me, say it to my face.
data.content_game_1: If there is anything that you are not happy about me, say it to my face.
data.answer_en_hint: If there is anything that you are not happy about me, say it to my face.

data.trans: Cố tình lờ đi, giả vờ không biết
data.trans_hint: Tôi hối hận vì đã làm ngơ trước hành động của họ. Tôi không biết nó có thể gây ra thiệt hại nghiêm trọng đến nhiều người như vậy.
data.en_hint: I regret turning a blind eye to their action. I didn't know it could take such a heavy toll on many lives.
data.content_game_1: I regret turning a blind eye to their action. I didn't know it could take such a heavy toll on many lives.
data.answer_en_hint: I regret turning a blind eye to their action. I didn't know it could take such a heavy toll on many lives.
